data.name: How to drive clarity in Product teams
data.summary: Catch Siddharth Goyal, Head of Product at Booking.com talk to Dhruv Mathur of Little Black Book,  about right frameworks to use & right culture to build, to drive product clarity
data.speakers: Siddharth Goyal (Head of Product, @bookingcom), Dhruv Mathur, Co-Founder, Little Black Book
